Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.shape.text

Class TextEntity

java.lang.Object
com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.YaegerEntity
com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.shape.ShapeEntity<javafx.scene.text.Text>
com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.shape.text.TextEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Anchorable, Bounded, EventInitiator, GameNode, Rotatable, Placeable, Removeable, SceneChild, Initializable, DimensionsProvider, TimerListProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
DynamicTextEntity
public class TextEntity
extends ShapeEntity<javafx.scene.text.Text>
A TextEntity can be used to display a line of text on a YaegerScene.

    • setFont

      public void setFont​(javafx.scene.text.Font font)
      Set the Font to be used. A Font encapsulates multiple properties.

      To only set the font type and size: setFont(Font.FONT ("Verdana", 20));

      It is also possible to set more properties: setFont(Font.FONT("Verdana", FontWeight.BOLD, 70));

      Parameters:
      font - the Font to be used

    • getFont
